docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text:
mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.

docs.title: Repository
docs.text:
• Create an empty github repository
  • Add readme.md file
  • Select GNU Public Licence

docs.title: Create Virtual Env
docs.text:
• Create virtual env in the repo folder
  • python -m venv venv

docs.title: Install Mkdocs Material
docs.text:
• Pip install mkdocs material in the repo folder
  • pip install mkdocs-material

docs.title: Initiate the mkdocs Project
docs.text:
• mkdocs new . will create the mkdocs yaml file and docs folder inside the repo folder
  • mkdocs new .
